EmailTemplate.subject: Best Kept ProSeries Secrets
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Greetings! I thought you'd appreciate these articles. The first is a veteran ProSeries® customer's take on the product's "best kept secrets". The second article looks beyond tax software and discusses some of the other business applications that can enhance the productivity of tax and accounting professionals.
Best Kept Secrets About ProSeries When I was asked to write this article, I was a little intimidated … what are the "best kept secrets" in ProSeries? Do I even know them? Then, I realized, like any other program, there are features we learn about and remember, features we learn about and don't remember and features that we don't learn about at all...
Business Apps You'll Love Everyone is interested in finding a way to get more time back in his or her day. As accountants, especially, we must be diligent about our work processes. We earn goodwill with our clients by making any part of their work just a little bit easier...
I hope your evaluation of ProSeries is progressing nicely. Let me know if you have any questions or need any help.
{!User.Name} ProSeries Tax Consultant {!User.Phone} {!User.Email}
